contentHtml:
Test: NBA Weekly Recap (Dec 1-5, 2025)

This is a test article used to validate the ingestion script. It includes concrete details: Lakers 112-105 vs Suns on Dec 2, 2025.

The week at a glance

The Lakers beat the Suns 112-105 on Dec 2, 2025, moving to 14-7.

Statement wins and bad losses

  • Dec 2 — Lakers 112, Suns 105 — Lakers 14-7, Suns 12-8 — Important because...

Players who shifted the landscape

  • LeBron James — 34 pts, 8 ast vs PHX on Dec 2

Injuries and storylines to monitor

  • Player X — knee sprain — expected to miss 2-4 weeks.

Standings snapshot

East: Celtics 15-5; West: Lakers 14-7.

What to watch next week

  • Lakers vs Nets — Dec 7 — Why it matters.
